name: A Snapshot of My Life
description: This game was made as part of an assignment for a class. The goal was to encapsulate how my life has been since the quarantine for Covid-19 began. I answered the questions; what have I been doing with my time while in quarantine, what has my focus been on during this time. As well as just showing a glimpse into my head space/mentality and displaying anything new that has been going on in my life.
